name: Apollo
desc: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker's space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated.

name: Ares
desc: End of Your Turn: You may remove an unoccupied block (not dome) neighboring your unmoved Worker.

name: Artemis
desc: Your Move: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.

name: Athena
desc: Opponent's Turn: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.

name: Atlas
desc: Your Build: Your Worker may build a dome at any level.

name: Charon
desc: Your Move: Before your Worker moves, you may force a neighboring opponent Worker to the space directly on the other side of your Worker, if that space is unoccupied.

name: Demeter
desc: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.

name: Hephaestus
desc: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.

name: Hestia
desc: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but this cannot be on a perimeter space.

name: Minotaur
desc: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker's space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level.

name: Pan
desc: Win Condition: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.

name: Prometheus
desc: Your Turn: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.

name: Triton
desc: Your Move: Each time your Worker moves into a perimeter space, it may immediately move again.

name: Zeus
desc: Your Build: Your Worker may build a block under itself.
